project_abstract.cdata: The Education Rehabilitation and Development Project, Third Education Project supports the Government's education strategy within its structural adjustment framework, by reviewing annually an action plan containing sector budgetary targets, the scholarship program and budget, and staffing and pedagogical targets.  Specifically, the project aims to rehabilitate the education system for improved quality and efficiency in primary schooling and higher education.  It also hopes to improve sector management for a more effective use of resources in the Ministry of National Education and higher education.
